nub.core.constraint

Class LocalConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • nub.core.constraint.Constraint
      • nub.core.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint
        • nub.core.constraint.LocalConstraint

  • public class LocalConstraint
extends AxisPlaneConstraint
    An AxisPlaneConstraint defined in the Node local coordinate system.

    The AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection() and AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection() are expressed in the Node local coordinate system (see Node.reference() ).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class nub.core.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint

        AxisPlaneConstraint.Type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalConstraint() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Quaternion constrainRotation(Quaternion rotation, Node node)
      When AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintType() is of Type AXIS, constrain rotation to be a rotation around an axis whose direction is defined in the Node local coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection().
      Vector constrainTranslation(Vector translation, Node node)
      Depending on AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintType(), constrain translation to be along an axis or limited to a plane defined in the local coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection().

      • Methods inherited from class nub.core.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint

        rotationConstraintDirection, rotationConstraintType, setRotationConstraint, setRotationConstraintDirection, setRotationConstraintType, setTranslationConstraint, setTranslationConstraintDirection, setTranslationConstraintType, translationConstraintDirection, translationConstraintType

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
